3.0.0.en: Upgrade to SDK v3 + bug fixes + added broadcast flowcard trigger

3.0.2.en: Fix for HA cover discovery (Fibaro shutters)

3.1.0.en: MQTT Device: Handling of JSON input & output message formats

3.1.3.en: Changed default HA status topic to: homeassistant/status

3.1.5.en: Homey library update + changed HA default status topic

3.1.7.en: Skip messages not meant for the HUB

3.4.0.en: MQTT Device: value template math expressions

3.4.1.en: MQTT Device: output template math expressions

4.1.0.en: Added device filter and device default state

4.1.2.en: Added device sort by time of adding.

4.1.3.en: Converted app settings view to Homey style.

4.1.4.en: Fixed missing title after changing settings for MQTT device.

4.1.5.en: Added workaround for wrong dim unit (norwegian).

4.1.6.en: Added workaround for wrong dim unit (norwegian).

4.1.7.en: Converted Mqtt device pair view to Homey style.

4.1.8.en: Converted Homie device pair view to Homey style.

4.2.0.en: Added flow trigger for memory/cpu warnings. Added restart flow/button. Added capability name setting.

4.2.1.en: Fixed capability name setting for HA discovery. Fixed HA discovery restart on settings saved/hub restart

4.2.3.en: Changed start/stop control in app settings. Fixed custom settings. Fixed HA discovey on Hub restart

4.2.4.en: Fixed HA discovey on Hub restart

4.3.0.en: Added new device classes and capabilities. Added device setting for cumulative option

4.3.1.en: Added device setting for device class. Fixed int (0..100) conversion.

4.3.2.en: HomeyEnergy: Added device settings to define device as cumulative and set imported/exported meter capabilities.

4.3.4.en: Added JavaScript function as valueTemplate/outputTemplate. Use syntax: (value) => { return value * 100 }.

4.3.5.en: Fixed unit check error for enum capabilities.

4.3.6.en: Fixed show/hide details in app settings. Added state_class for measure/meter capabilities.

4.3.7.en: Added generic Number and Text capabilities.

4.3.8.en: Added capability specific device_class for HA auto discovery.

4.3.9.en: Fixed entity domain determination for HA auto discovery.

4.3.10.en: Added capability specific device_class for HA auto discovery.

4.3.11.en: Changed capability selection in pair view. Added capability id.
